sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import RecipeIngredientForm from './RecipeIngredientForm'

const RecipeForm = ({onSearch, ingredients}) => {
    return (
        <form >
            <RecipeIngredientForm onSearch = {onSearch} ingredients = {ingredients}/>
            <button class="bg-green-500 text-white rounded-md px-8 py-2 text-base font-medium hover:bg-green-600 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-green-300"
		    id="open-btn">
		        Open Modal
	        </button>
        </form>
    )
}

export default RecipeForm
